name: RETAIL
description: This expansion for Cards Against Humanity is an Indiegogo reward for people who backed Season 3 of TableTop.

calls.text: How are the writers of Cards Against Humanity spending your $25?
Looking to earn big bucks? Learn how to make _ work for you!

responses.text: A teenage boy gunning for a handjob.
Feeding a man a pie made of his own children.
Ironically buying a trucker hat and then ironically being a trucker for 38 years.
